title: Outdoor Quad Camping Chair - Lightweight, Portable Folding Design - Adjustable Footrest, Cup Holder, Storage Carrying Bag – Durable Material, Steel Frame - by GigaTent
features: THE BEST OUTDOORS SEAT: Made from premium grade polyester with a powder coated steel frame, this folding chair is an essential whenever you're outside. On the patio, at picnics, the beach or BBQs.
EASY TO CARRY FOLDABLE DESIGN: Weighing only 9 pounds, this extremely light chair can be taken on hikes or camping. When not travelling, it stores compactly without taking up space in your closet.
ADJUSTABLE FOOTREST: This quad seat allows you to sit back, relax and throw your feet up in any position with the foot rest you can adjust be high, low, or anywhere in between for ideal comfort.
AWESOME FEATURES: This camping seat comes with comfortable armrests and a built-in cup holder to enjoy a cold soda or beer. The high back chair measures 40" tall x 21" wide with a 250lb capacity.
EASILY PORTABLE: A lightweight construction make it easily movable along with the included heavy duty carrying bag with a shoulder strap – bring your chair from place to place will be a breeze!
description: When the sun's out and a craving for adventure strikes,

is here to bring you everything you need to make your outdoor experience a memorable one. Our top quality foldable camping chair is here to provide the perfect seating arrangement you can ever get while you're enjoying the great outdoors!

• 600D Polyester Fabric• Powder Coated Steel Frame• Compact Foldable Design• Adjustable Footrest• Arm Rests• Built-In Cup Holder• 16" Seat Height • 40" Back Height• 21.5" Seat Width • 15" Seat Depth • 250 Pound Weight Capacity• 9.25 Pounds Weight • 38" x 8" Carrying Bag With Shoulder Strap• Available in Green and Blue
A MUST HAVE FOR ANY OUTDOOR ACTIVITY

An outdoor getaway isn't perfect without ideal relaxation. Whether you're surrounding yourself in nothing but trees and grasslands, conquering the robust terrain of a mountain side, or huddling in your backyard around a campfire telling ghost stories, our chairs provide optimal and necessary utility. High grade polyester fabric and a steel coated frame offer unmatched comfort and reliability that you won't find anywhere else. With its unique foldable design, you can effortlessly store it anywhere for maximum convenience. Pleasant armrests for supreme relaxation and a built-in beverage holder make a necessary addition to your camping and outdoor equipment.
Of course when you're in the thick of nature, you may be moving from one place to another quite frequently. We try to make mobility as simple as possible here at

, that's why we're including a carrying bag with every chair with a comfortable shoulder strap! Lugging your chair around will never be an issue with our excellent camping chair! Get yours today to upgrade your camping gear or patio furniture and see what it means to truly enjoy the great outdoors!
